title: In Jerusalem, And Caught In A Crossfire Of Thrown Stones
teaser: Following the deaths of three Israeli teens and the apparent revenge killing of a Palestinian, Jerusalem is as tense as it has been in years. NPR's Ari Shapiro and his translator found themselves victims of rock-throwing there. Their story offers a window into a city on edge.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
